sentence.Network_en: They could only afford the meanest of rooms in a poor area.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们只能住得起贫民区里最简陋的住处.

sentence.Network_en: World had to be in travail, that the meanest flower might blow.
sentence.Network_cn: 社会必须经历阵痛以便让最卑微的花开放.
